fields.name: Module
fields.text: Modules/Units that are taught are listed here.

fields.name: Staff
fields.text: Academic staff with teaching responsibilities are listed here.

fields.name: Standard Load
fields.text: The equations and factors governing the load equations are set per year.

fields.name: Task
fields.text: Roles or responsibilities that can be assigned to academic staff are listed here.

fields.name: About
fields.text: This is a web app for assigning and balancing teaching workload for staff in the University of Southampton's Department of Physics.

fields.name: Load Function
fields.text: These functions describe how load can be assigned per student for a given teaching task.
